item.title: Need Help On Pickup(not ::pickup)
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

Well, im trying to make pickup work when i ry to pickup an item from the floor (WinterLoves Souce) i get

[client-1-Hello]: Trade Request to: 12854
[client-1-Hello]: Trade Request to: 9792
[client-1-Hello]: Trade Request to: 9738
[client-1-Hello]: Trade Request to: 13110
[client-1-Hello]: Trade Request to: 13110
[client-1-Hello]: Trade Request to: 13110

i fixed it it used to dissconnect, now it only says that and doesnt pickup he is my pickup case too

			case 236: //pickup item
				int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
				int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
				int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
					if(ItemHandler.itemExists(itemID, itemX, itemY)) 
					if(absX == itemX && absY == itemY) 
                                             {
                                                {
						int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(itemID, itemX, itemY);
						pickupItem(itemID, itemAmount);
						ItemHandler.removeItem(itemID, itemX, itemY, itemAmount);
						//removeGroundItem(itemX, itemY, itemID);
                                                }
                                }

help pls
